  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ProductResultBound
    Specifies the bound calculated for a particular product result.
    ProductResultBound.Builder
    Specifies the bound calculated for a particular product result.
    ProductResultMetadata
    Specifies result metadata specific to product records.
    ProductResultMetadata.Builder
    Specifies result metadata specific to product records.
    ResultsetCategoricalCount
    Specifies the count of items in a particular result category included in a search response.
    ResultsetCategoricalCount.Builder
    Specifies the count of items in a particular result category included in a search response.
    SearchBounds
    Specifies bounds for a search query.
    SearchBounds.Builder
    Specifies bounds for a search query.
    SearchMetadata  
    SearchOptions
    Specifies options for conducting a fulltext search operation.
    SearchOptions.Builder
    Specifies options for conducting a fulltext search operation.
    SearchResultOptions
    Specifies options for results returned from a search operation.
    SearchResultOptions.Builder
    Specifies options for results returned from a search operation.
    SearchResults  
    SearchResults.PartnerSearchResult
    Specifies a partner or partner location profile that matched a search.
    SearchResults.PartnerSearchResult.Builder
    Specifies a partner or partner location profile that matched a search.
    SearchResults.ProductSearchResult
    Specifies a product that matched a search.
    SearchResults.ProductSearchResult.Builder
    Specifies a product that matched a search.
    SearchResults.SearchResult
    Specifies an individual matching result to a search operation, regardless of type.
    SearchResults.SearchResult.Builder
    Specifies an individual matching result to a search operation, regardless of type.
    SearchResults.UserSearchResult
    Specifies a user or user profile that matched a search.
    SearchResults.UserSearchResult.Builder
    Specifies a user or user profile that matched a search.
    SearchResultset
    Specifies a set of items returned as results to a search operation.
    SearchResultset.Builder
    Specifies a set of items returned as results to a search operation.
    SearchResultsetMetadata
    Specifies metadata for a search resultset.
    SearchResultsetMetadata.Builder
    Specifies metadata for a search resultset.
    SearchSpec
    Specification for a search operation.
    SearchSpec.Builder
    Specification for a search operation.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ResultHighlightMode
    Specifies available modes to highlight terms in search results.
    SearchableCollection
    Specifies system objects that searches can be performed on.
    SearchResultExtension
    Specifies data extensions that may be requested, and returned, with stock search results.
    SearchResults.SearchResult.ResultCase  
    SearchSortMode
    Specifies modes for sorting search results.
